sector.narrative: Cash Transfers: Delivery of cash transfers through government system (beneficiary identification, grievance mechanisms, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)

Cash Transfers: Technical support to government cash transfer system development and expansion (design, targeting, beneficiary selection, grievance mechanism, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
Linking cash to other programs, information and services (information on essential family practices, livelihoods, psycho-social support, etc.)
National social protection strategies: Policies, strategies, legislation and coordination (inter-ministerial, donor)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: Mauritania United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Mauritania Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Social Inclusion)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Mauritania 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: La Mauritanie dispose d’un programme national intégré de protection sociale bien coordonné et suivi pour un accès des filles et des garçons à des services sociaux de base de qualité dans les zones les plus vulnérables

description.narrative: L'agenda de la protection sociale demeure au cœur des priorités nationales du Gouvernement mauritanien, notamment avec la création très récente d'une agence nationale de protection sociale, logée au niveau de la présidence. UNICEF reste un partenaire de taille de ce secteur, notamment pour l'appui technique et financier constant qu'il apporte au niveau institutionnel, à la mise en œuvre et au suivi de la Stratégie nationale de protection sociale (SNPS) et au niveau opérationnel avec le programme national de transferts sociaux (transferts monétaires et promotion sociale) Tekavoul. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/02/2020

title.narrative: Beneficiaries of cash transfers are linked with other programs information and services
Social welfare workforce strengthened and connected to social protection system (case management, referral capacity development)
Coordination: Coordination mechanisms for social protection systems established countrywide
